participant_1.name: Greg
participant_1.personality: Inquisitive and caring, Greg has a strong interest in his daughter's achievements and enjoys engaging conversations.
participant_1.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. my favorite movie is friday. i am a doctor. i enjoy going to the park. i'm now looking for a new job.

participant_2.name: Alice
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and knowledgeable, Alice loves to share her experiences and has a passion for travel and literature.
participant_2.background: i think i will retire in a few years. i am a librarian. i'm 60 years old. i've visited spain a times. i really like to travel.
